tool_description: Adjusts nutritional values to account for nutrient losses during cooking processes such as boiling, roasting, frying, or steaming.

raw_vitamin_c_mg.description: Original vitamin C content in mg

error_messages: Unsupported cooking method: Use one of [boiling, steaming, roasting, frying, grilling, baking, sauteing]. Check spelling and use lowercase.
Invalid cooking time: Cooking time must be a positive integer between 1 and 480 minutes (8 hours).
Invalid nutritional values: All nutritional values must be non-negative numbers.
Extreme cooking time: Cooking times over 8 hours may produce unreliable results. Consider shorter cooking periods.
usage: Specify cooking_method, cooking_time_minutes, and raw nutritional values. Returns adjusted nutritional content accounting for cooking losses based on established food science data.

adjusted_vitamin_c_mg.description: Vitamin C content after cooking losses

loss_explanation.description: Brief explanation of nutrient loss factors
